column4: Having a weird problem here. I just go home and fired up my laptop only to have it hang on boot :( tried running recovery mode and it hangs on disk checking root at 27%. So I'm using the liveCD right now to get on IRC. I havent a clue what to do to fix my root. any help please.
sudo fsck /dev/hda1 (if that is your root disc)
can i run that from the live cd?
it's the only way to do it when your system doesn't boot :p
